name: untitledLDJAM51
description:
Become one with the game, are you the game? is it a game? what is a game?

All of those questions can potentially be answered once you've played this game.

Perchance life is but a game and we're the quarters in the arcade machine... perhaps one of the guns in Call of Duty Warzone had dreams? Maybe you're just a dream, or I am. maybe this itch.io page is a hallucination? Maybe it's too late to step back from the edge of sanity? alas now take the plunge, or plunger, whichever is closest, and dive in.
